titles.title: Home School Opportunities Make Education Sound Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax deduction for itemizers and nonitemizers for expenses relating to home schooling.
Home School Opportunities Make Education Sound Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Home School Opportunities Make Education Sound Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow all taxpayers, including taxpayers who do not itemize their deductions, a tax deduction for expenses relating to the home schooling of their children at the elementary or secondary school level.
